column3: utACK cfc55edb6ae7bc49b4df38954fc434ffa831b78f\n\nNice find @hebasto! Thanks for cleaning this up.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14556](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14556.html) (qt: Fix bug #13299 by hebasto)
* [#14437](

Concept ACK, however it looks like the changes could be more comprehensive.

The remaining uses of `adjustedTime` in `/qt/` are in:
* FormatTxStatus
* getWalletTxDetails
* tryGetTxStatus

Of which, it looks like the usage of  `adjustedTime` in atleast  `FormatTxStatus` is also redundant?
@practicalswift, @fanquake Thank you for your reviews.\n\n@fanquake's comment has been addressed. Please re-review.
utACK 58fbed1\n\nCan you squash 58fbed1 into cfc55ed, and prefix the commit message with `qt:`, so that it's clear that these are qt/wallet changes.
